title: Guess The Country Capital
stack: React / Expo / JavaScript / Picker DropDown / React Hooks
desc: A quiz app to test knowledge of world capitals.
more: Mobile-first quiz flow with quick feedback and clean UI.
writeup: Concept: A fast, playful trivia experience for short sessions.
Planning: Mapped the question flow, states, and UI hierarchy for small screens.
Development: Built reusable question components and state logic with hooks.

title: Sustainable Clothing Website
desc: A website promoting sustainable clothing choices.
more: Wireframes and user flows for a sustainability-driven brand.
writeup: Concept: A brand that promotes sustainable fashion choices.
Planning: Mapped user journeys and key screens (home, explore, saved, planner).
Development: Produced wireframes with eco-impact messaging and trust cues.

title: Hawker Hero
desc: A recommendation and rating platform for local food stalls.
more: Brand-led UI with product listing, filtering, and checkout flow.
writeup: Concept: A local hawker discovery and rating platform.
Planning: Defined user flows for browse, filter, and checkout.
Development: Implemented menu-first UI with reviews and ratings.

title: Escape Room
desc: A virtual reality escape room game.
more: Immersive VR puzzles with guided storytelling.
writeup: Concept: A narrative-led VR escape experience.
Planning: Sketched puzzle pacing, player guidance, and environment cues.
Development: Implemented interactive puzzles and onboarding balance.

title: FoodWaste Tracker
desc: An app to track and reduce food waste.
more: Team-built app with dashboards and waste tracking.
writeup: Concept: A tool to reduce household food waste.
Planning: Defined data capture, dashboard needs, and team roles.
Development: Built full-stack flows with charts and tracking.

title: Learn@RP
desc: A redesign of the Learn@RP platform for better user experience.
more: Redesigned navigation and clarity for core learning tasks.
writeup: Concept: A clearer, calmer Learn@RP experience for students.
Planning: Audited pain points and redesigned navigation structure.
Development: Produced UI screens with improved hierarchy and spacing.

title: Income Expense Tracker
desc: An app to track personal income and expenses.
more: Personal finance tracker with clear category breakdowns.
writeup: Concept: A lightweight tracker for daily income and expenses.
Planning: Mapped quick-entry flow and category breakdowns.
Development: Built the UI with minimal steps and clear summaries.
